summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2486 for the improvement of the west side of California Avenue, from West Brandon Street to West Juneau Street, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete walks thereon, together with wooden crosswalks across West Findlay Street and to the center line of California Avenue only; under Ordinance No. 27239, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
